content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft leather, I need to place 4 rabbit_hide side by side in the crafting grid. I will first move the rabbit_hide from slot 16 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}]
thought: I will move the next rabbit_hide from slot 16 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I will move the next rabbit_hide from slot 16 to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I will move the next rabbit_hide from slot 16 to slot 5, which is below slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I can craft the leather by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
